name: Ferocious Resolve
descriptionText: Your orc heritage allows you to fight on.
benefitText: You gain the ferocity universal monster ability, allowing you to continue fighting at negative hit points. When using this ability, you gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks.
normalText: A half-orc with the orc ferocity racial trait can fight for 1 more round after he is brought below 0 hit points.
